title.rendered: Allianz supports Smile Foundation’s Skilling Programme

content.rendered:
allianz supports Smile Foundation's Skilling programme

Smile Foundation’s livelihood initiative, STeP, in Pune, is making a significant impact by providing skill training to over 135 youth from underserved communities. This commendable effort is made possible with the support of Allianz.

 

The program’s core focus lies in equipping these aspiring individuals with the necessary skills and knowledge in the Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance (BFSI) sector. In addition to comprehensive training, the participants benefit from industry exposure, career counseling, and robust placement support, enhancing their chances of securing meaningful employment. Many of the program’s beneficiaries have already achieved remarkable success by securing promising positions in renowned companies, marking a significant milestone in their professional journeys.
